1: You got much less sleep than usual and found you didn't miss it at all.
2: Thought raced through your head or you couldn't slow down your mind.
3: You were so easily distracted by things around you that you had trouble concentrating or staying on track.
4: You had much more energy than usual.
5: You felt so good or hyper that other people thought you were not your normal self or you were so hyper that you got into trouble.
6: You were much more active or did many more things than usual.
7: You were much more social or outgoing than usual, for example, you called friends by your phone in the middle of the night.
8: You were much more interested in sex than usual.
9: You were so irritable that you shouted at people or started fights or arguments.
10: You did things that were unusual for you or that other people might have thought were excessive, foolish, or risky
11: You cry and smile at the same time or you notice your mood were changing very fast
12: You were much more talkative or spoke much faster than usual
13: You felt much more self confident than usual.

1: Have there been times when you felt like a different person and the following happened to you?
